titles.title: Justice for Victims of IRS Scams and Identity Theft Act of 2017
Justice for Victims of IRS Scams and Identity Theft Act of 2017

To require the Attorney General to establish procedures for expedited review of the case of any person who unlawfully solicits personal information for purposes of committing identity theft, while purporting to be acting on behalf of the IRS, and for other purposes.
Justice for Victims of IRS Scams and Identity Theft Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
